name: Flipcat
description:
Tiny Bunnycat on an adventure with the power to flip the world.
 A  game made for Epic Mega Jam 2022.

Directions:
"E" to Grab
"E" on puddle to flip
Spacebar to jump
A & D to walk 

You can also play with Xbox controller, though the menu does not work when playing with controller.
A - Jump
X- Interact

PS: There is a bug that when you are too close to the box, interactions can get janky and not work properly.

Animations from Mixamo
Textures from GameTextures.com
